definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: draw (Ar. masay cleanse uterus of camel, Aram. m4o0 clean, stroke, the face, etc.; [[מְשָׁא]] (Talm.) wash the hands; Zinj. [[משׂי]][[[י]]] perhaps wash oneself, DHM:Sendsch. 60);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. sf. [[מִן־הַמַּיִם מְשִׁיתִהוּ]] Ex 2:10 out of the water I drew him (used to explain [[משֶׁה]], but v. this infr.)
